struct

Class ScreenData

  • java.lang.Object
    • struct.ScreenData

  • public class ScreenData
extends java.lang.Object
    ゲーム画面の画像や背景色などの画面情報を扱うクラス

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer displayByteBuffer
      Pixel data of the screen are saved in the form of ByteBuffer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScreenData()
      クラスコンストラクタ．
      ScreenData(ScreenData screenData)
      指定されたデータでゲーム画面の画素情報を作成するクラスコンストラクタ．

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer createDisplayByteBuffer()
      Obtain RGB data of the screen in the form of ByteBuffer Warning: If the window is disabled, will just returns a black buffer.
      java.nio.ByteBuffer getDisplayByteBuffer()
      Obtains RGB data of the screen in the form of ByteBuffer.
      Warning: If the window is disabled, will just return a black buffer.
      byte[] getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes()
      Obtains RGB data of the screen in the form of byte[].
      Warning: If the window is disabled, will just return a black buffer.
      byte[] getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes(int newWidth, int newHeight, boolean grayScale)
      Obtains RGB data or the grayScale data of the screen in the form of byte[].
      Warning: This method doesn't return exactly the same buffer as getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes().

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • displayByteBuffer

        private java.nio.ByteBuffer displayByteBuffer
        Pixel data of the screen are saved in the form of ByteBuffer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScreenData

        public ScreenData()
        クラスコンストラクタ．

      • ScreenData

        public ScreenData(ScreenData screenData)
        指定されたデータでゲーム画面の画素情報を作成するクラスコンストラクタ．
        Parameters:
        screenData - ゲーム画面のデータ

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayByteBuffer

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer getDisplayByteBuffer()
        Obtains RGB data of the screen in the form of ByteBuffer.
        Warning: If the window is disabled, will just return a black buffer.
        Returns:
        The RGB data of the screen in the form of ByteBuffer

      • getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes

        public byte[] getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes()
        Obtains RGB data of the screen in the form of byte[].
        Warning: If the window is disabled, will just return a black buffer.
        Returns:
        The RGB data of the screen in the form of byte[]

      • getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes

        public byte[] getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes(int newWidth,
                                          int newHeight,
                                          boolean grayScale)
        Obtains RGB data or the grayScale data of the screen in the form of byte[].
        Warning: This method doesn't return exactly the same buffer as getDisplayByteBufferAsBytes().
        Parameters:
        newWidth - The width in pixel for the scaled image
        newHeight - The height in pixel for the scaled image
        grayScale - True to use grayScale for the scaled image (1 byte per pixel instead of 3 bytes per pixel with RGB)
        Returns:
        The RGB data or the grayScale data of the screen in the form of byte[]

      • createDisplayByteBuffer

        private java.nio.ByteBuffer createDisplayByteBuffer()
        Obtain RGB data of the screen in the form of ByteBuffer Warning: If the window is disabled, will just returns a black buffer.
        Returns:
        RGB data of the screen in the form of ByteBuffer
